text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Area" means a geographic area within one or more political subdivisions within the State described by a closed perimeter boundary.

"BRAC Revitalization and Incentive Zone" means an area that:
meets the requirements of § 5-1303 of this subtitle; and
is designated as a BRAC Revitalization and Incentive Zone by the Secretary under § 5-1304 of this subtitle.
"Enterprise zone" has the meaning stated in § 5-701 of this title.
"Political subdivision" means any county or municipal corporation.
"Submission date" means the date the Secretary receives an application from a political subdivision for designation of a BRAC Revitalization and Incentive Zone.

"Tax increment financing bonds" means bonds issued by:
a political subdivision under Title 12, Subtitle 2 of this article; or
Baltimore City under Article II, § 62 of the Charter of Baltimore City.
